translations: n.（刨削下的）刨花，薄片（shaving 的复数）

sentences.sentence: He searched among the shavings--no one!
sentences.translation: 他在刨花中找了找——没有人！

sentences.sentence: "The cat," answered Pinocchio, seeing that little animal busily playing with some shavings in the corner of the room.
sentences.translation: “那只猫。”皮诺乔回答说，他看见那只小动物在房间的角落里忙着玩刨花。

sentences.sentence: The floor was covered with shavings from his wood carvings.
sentences.translation: 地板上满是他从木雕上刻下来的碎屑。
